original: intros n a x H. revert a x H. induction n. - intros a x H. unfold Derive_n, PSeries, PS_derive_n. simpl. reflexivity. - intros a x H. unfold Derive_n, PSeries, PS_derive_n. simpl. rewrite Derive_PSeries. + rewrite is_derive_n_unique. * reflexivity. * apply is_derive_n_PSeries. apply H. + apply ex_derive_PSeries. apply H.
